marker.ph:
<<ListView x:Name="MonkeyList" RowHeight="200" SeparatorVisibility="None"> <ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <ViewCell> <Grid RowSpacing="5" ColumnSpacing="0"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<ffimageloading:CachedImage Aspect="AspectFill" Grid.RowSpan="2" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" IsOpaque="true" CacheDuration="365" FadeAnimationForCachedImages="true" FadeAnimationEnabled="true" DownsampleToViewSize="true" Source="{Binding Image}" />
<controls:GradientView StartColor="White" EndColor="##3e6366" Grid.Row="0" Grid.RowSpan="2"/>
<Label TextColor="White" Margin="10" Text="{Binding Name}" FontAttributes="Bold" FontSize="Large" LineBreakMode="WordWrap" Grid.Row="1" VerticalOptions="End"/> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView>.../>
<<StyleSheet Source="/Styles/core.css" />.../>
<<ListView.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <TextCell Text="{Binding DisplayName}" /> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate>.../>
<<DataTemplate> <TextCell Text="{Binding DisplayName}" /> </DataTemplate>.../>
<<TextCell Text="{Binding DisplayName}" />.../>

<<Grid RowSpacing="5" ColumnSpacing="0"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions>
<ffimageloading:CachedImage Aspect="AspectFill" Grid.RowSpan="2" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" RetryCount="1" RetryDelay="2000" IsOpaque="true" CacheDuration="365" FadeAnimationForCachedImages="true" FadeAnimationEnabled="true" ErrorPlaceholder = "hokone.jpg" Source="{Binding BackGroundImage}" />
<controls:GradientView StartColor="White" EndColor="##3e6366" Grid.Row="0" Grid.RowSpan="2"/>
<Grid Margin="10" RowSpacing="10" ColumnSpacing="10" Grid.Row="1"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> <RowDefinition Height="25"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="25"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<Label class="h2-clear" Text="{Binding Title}" Grid.Row="0" Grid.ColumnSpan="3" LineBreakMode="WordWrap"/>
<circleview:CircleImage Source="{Binding ImageLink}" Aspect="AspectFill" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" WidthRequest="25" HeightRequest="25" /> <Label class="label-clear" Text="{Binding Handle}" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" VerticalOptions="Center" />
<StackLayout Orientation="Horizontal" VerticalOptions="Center" Grid.Column="2" Grid.Row="1" Spacing="5" > <Label class="label-clear" Text="{Binding PublishDateFormated, StringFormat='{0:MMMM d, yyyy}'}" /> </StackLayout> </Grid> </Grid> <ViewCell.Effects> <effects:ViewShadowEffect Radius="5" DistanceX="5" DistanceY="5" Color="Red" /> </ViewCell.Effects>.../>

<<Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <ffimageloading:CachedImage Aspect="AspectFill" Grid.RowSpan="2" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand" IsOpaque="true" CacheDuration="365" FadeAnimationForCachedImages="true" FadeAnimationEnabled="true" DownsampleToViewSize="true" Source="{Binding Image}" /> <Label TextColor="White" Text="{Binding Name}" LineBreakMode="WordWrap" Grid.Row="1" VerticalOptions="End"/>.../>
<<RowDefinition Height="*"/> <RowDefinition Height="Auto"/>.../>

/* This method is invoked when the application has loaded and is ready to run. In this ... */

<<Shell.Resources> <ResourceDictionary> <Color x:Key="NavigationPrimary">##2196F3</Color> <Style x:Key="BaseStyle" TargetType="Element"> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellForegroundColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTitleColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellDisabledColor" Value="##B4FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarForegroundColor" Value="White"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarTitleColor" Value="White"/> </Style> <Style TargetType="ShellItem" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseStyle}" /> </ResourceDictionary> </Shell.Resources> <ShellItem> <ShellSection> <ShellContent ContentTemplate="{DataTemplate local:VisualChallengePage}"/> </ShellSection> </ShellItem>.../>

<<ResourceDictionary> <Color x:Key="NavigationPrimary">##2196F3</Color> <Style x:Key="BaseStyle" TargetType="Element"> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellForegroundColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTitleColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellDisabledColor" Value="##B4FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarForegroundColor" Value="White"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarTitleColor" Value="White"/> </Style> <Style TargetType="ShellItem" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseStyle}" /> </ResourceDictionary>.../>

<<Color x:Key="NavigationPrimary">##2196F3</Color> <Style x:Key="BaseStyle" TargetType="Element"> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellForegroundColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTitleColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellDisabledColor" Value="##B4FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarForegroundColor" Value="White"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarTitleColor" Value="White"/> </Style> <Style TargetType="ShellItem" BasedOn="{StaticResource BaseStyle}" />.../>

<<Setter Property="Shell.ShellBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellForegroundColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTitleColor" Value="White" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellDisabledColor" Value="##B4FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarBackgroundColor" Value="{StaticResource NavigationPrimary}" /> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarForegroundColor" Value="White"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarUnselectedColor" Value="##95FFFFFF"/> <Setter Property="Shell.ShellTabBarTitleColor" Value="White"/>.../>
<<ShellSection> <ShellContent ContentTemplate="{DataTemplate local:VisualChallengePage}"/> </ShellSection>.../>
<<ShellContent ContentTemplate="{DataTemplate local:VisualChallengePage}"/>.../>

<<Application.Resources>
</Application.Resources>.../>

<controls:GradientView StartColor="White" EndColor="##3e6366" Grid.Row="0" Grid.RowSpan="2"/>
<Label TextColor="White" Margin="10" Text="{Binding Name}" FontAttributes="Bold" FontSize="Large" LineBreakMode="WordWrap" Grid.Row="1" VerticalOptions="End"/> </Grid> </ViewCell> </DataTemplate> </ListView.ItemTemplate> </ListView>.../>
